novel knowledge - based WSD algorithm.from sentence: In this paper , we propose a novel knowledge - based WSD algorithm for the all - word WSD task , which utilizes the whole document as the context for a word , rather than just the current sentence used by most WSD systems .

whole document.from sentence: In order to model the whole document for WSD , we leverage the formalism of topic models , especially Latent Dirichlet Allocation ( LDA ) .

variant.from sentence: Our method is a variant of LDA in which the topic proportions for a document are replaced by synset proportions for a document .

non-uniform prior.from sentence: We use a non-uniform prior for the synset distribution over words to model the frequency of words within a synset .

relationships.from sentence: Furthermore , we also model the relationships between synsets by using a logisticnormal prior for drawing the synset proportions of the document .
